Misc.¶

The controller that routes requests and returns responses.

www.app.authenticate()¶

Return error message.

www.app.check_auth(username, password)¶

Check if given username and password match correct credentials.

Parameters:
  • username (string) – The entered username.
  • password (string) – The entered password.
Returns:

bool. True if username and password are correct, False otherwise.

Returns:The sale’s page or an error page if no sale found.

Returns:View of search page.

determine_pages(data)¶

Receive data dict and return with additional information about pager.

Includes number of records, page length, number of pages, current page and page offset and URL query string parameters and returns as dict.

category.

Return updated views for /realestate/search.

Command line tool for deleting all records for a given date or date range.

Meant for quicker testing.

Usage:
delete_dates.py <single_date> delete_dates.py <early_date> <late_date>
Options:
-h, --help Show help screen.
--version Show version number.

Dates are in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Ex. 2016-12-31

exception scripts.delete_dates.BadDateRangeError¶

Error for when date range is backward.

streets = None¶

Not sure what to do for “St.”. This –> [‘ St’, ‘ St.’] would also pick up something such as 123 Straight Road. The same could conceivably happen with “Ave”. “Dr” needs to become “Drive”, but have the same problem
